ee:transform.doc:name: Set OS Key, DefaultValue, pageNo, resultSummary

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- Mule::p('os.lastsyncdate.key')
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- Mule::p('os.lastsyncdate.default')
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- 1
%dw 2.0 import p from Mule output application/java --- p('app.page.size') as Number
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- 0
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { successCreate: 0, successUpdate: 0, successRename: 0, failed: 0 }

logger.doc:name: Log Site to Dimension Summary
logger.message: Site to Dimension Summary Result: #[vars.resultSummary] | Sync Date: #[vars.currentSyncDate]

logger.doc:name: START - Get Site Impl Paging
logger.message: START - Get Site Impl Paging Subflow - PageNo: #[vars.pageNo]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 import p from Mule output application/json --- { "pageEnabled": p('app.page.enabled') as Boolean, "pageNo": vars.pageNo as Number, "pageSize": vars.pageSize as Number, "lastModifiedDate": vars.lastSyncDate }
%dw 2.0 output application/java var totalRecords = vars.retrieveRecordCount + sizeOf(vars.site.data) --- totalRecords
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload.siteCode default ""
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload.sarfCode default ""

logger.doc:name: No Site Code or SARF Code Found
logger.message: #[output application/json --- "No Site Code or SARF Code Found - $(payload.id)"]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var summary = vars.resultSummary --- { successCreate: summary.successCreate, successUpdate: summary.successUpdate, successRename: summary.successRename, failed: summary.failed, emptySiteCode: ((summary.emptySiteCode default 0) + 1) }
%dw 2.0 output application/java var nextPage = vars.pageNo as Number + 1 --- nextPage

logger.doc:name: With next page
logger.message: With next page branch. Next pageNo : #[vars.pageNo]

logger.doc:name: Last page
logger.message: Last page. Record count: #[sizeOf(vars.site.data)] | Total Records: #[vars.retrieveRecordCount]

logger.doc:name: END - Get Project Impl Paging
logger.message: END - Get Project Impl Paging Subflow - PageNo: #[vars.pageNo]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var siteCodeExist = vars.dimension.data.code contains vars.siteCode var sarfCodeExist = vars.dimension.data.code contains vars.sarfCode --- if (!isEmpty(vars.siteCode) and !isEmpty(vars.sarfCode) and !siteCodeExist and sarfCodeExist) "RENAME" else if (isEmpty(vars.siteCode)) vars.sarfCode else vars.siteCode

%dw 2.0 output application/java var summary = vars.resultSummary --- { successCreate: summary.successCreate, successUpdate: summary.successUpdate, successRename: ((summary.successRename default 0) + 1), failed: summary.failed, emptySiteCode: summary.emptySiteCode, }
%dw 2.0 output application/java var dimension = vars.dimension.data --- { dimensionId: if (sizeOf(dimension) > 1) (dimension filter ($.code == vars.siteCode))[0].systemId else dimension[0].systemId }

%dw 2.0 output application/java var summary = vars.resultSummary --- { successCreate: summary.successCreate, successUpdate: ((summary.successUpdate default 0) + 1), successRename: summary.successRename, failed: summary.failed, emptySiteCode: summary.emptySiteCode, }

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java var summary = vars.resultSummary --- { successCreate: ((summary.successCreate default 0) + 1), successUpdate: summary.successUpdate, successRename: summary.successRename, failed: summary.failed, emptySiteCode: summary.emptySiteCode, }

logger.doc:name: ERROR - Process Site Record
logger.message: ERROR - Process Site Record - pageNo: #[vars.pageNo] recordNo: #[vars.counter -1] Exception: #[error.description] | #[error.errorMessage.payload]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var summary = vars.resultSummary --- { successCreate: summary.successCreate, successUpdate: summary.successUpdate, successRename: summary.successRename, failed: ((summary.failed default 0) + 1), emptySiteCode: summary.emptySiteCode, }
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- false
